subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter had 14 points and a season-high 13 assists, and Essence Carson added 14 points in the Liberty’s 73-60 victory over the Atlanta Dream on Tuesday night.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter had 14 points and a season-high 13 assists, and Essence Carson added 14 points in the Liberty’s 73-60 victory over the Atlanta Dream on Tuesday night.
